overview.en: xSigma (SIG) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. xSigma has a current supply of 3,386,747.97495109 with 2,139,850.46254846 in circulation. The last known price of xSigma is 4.02104963 USD and is down -30.42 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 6 active market(s) with $2,194,920.85 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://xsigma.com/.
